article:
A father and his teenage son were out together at a shopping mall one day.The son wanted to check out a new pair of   _  at the sports store.
     _  they were making their way through the
crowded food store,a young woman holding a number of bags   fell over  and the contents of several of them spilled across the floor.
   The son   _  around the woman and continued with the
flow only to realize that his father wasn't next to him.Looking around he   _  his father bending down
and helping the woman  pick up  the spilled items.
    Feeling a bit bad he hadn't thought to stop and help,he simply stood and  _  from the distance.He was   _  when his father handed the woman her
things and she simply took them away without  looking at  him and said "I can do
it myself!" When his father returned,the son expressed his  _  at how impolite the woman had been.
   In the sports store the son was so  _  about the
incident that he spent most of the time complaining .They soon left without the shoes.
   Later at   _  ,the son told his mother the story,  _   her to be just as angry as he was at the woman's   _  .His mother looked at her husband   _  enjoying
his meal and said,"Son,your father left that woman behind hours ago.Why are you   _  with her?"
   When we hold onto  _  feelings,all it does is leave us stuck in the past and  _  to move forward. One of the best things you can do to stay happy is to  _  to let things go.It is okay to show anger and unhappiness.  However   ,don't let them affect you and how you see the world.
